name: SoundInvaders
description:
Headphones required for directional audio to function

The invaders are coming... but you can only hear them!

An arcade, high score chasing, audio only FPS!

This is part of my dissertation project, focusing on generalised spatial audio.

Each download comes with 3 builds of the game using 3 different general audio spatializers, numbered 1 - 3, and the builds should be referred to as such in the questionnaire - which I would be incredibly thankful if you filled out after trying all 3 builds - a shortcut to it is included in the download, or linked below if you have an earlier version!

Questionnaire: https://forms.gle/eTVTbKLQMRcqxRTm8

Note: Linux builds aren't all verified working - please comment if you encounter any issues

Controls:

Moving the mouse left and right - rotates your view in the respective horizontal direction

Left click - Shoots directly in front of you, or reloads when your ammo is at 0

The Windows builds have experimental support for FreeTrack head tracking, if you have hardware that supports it, give it a try! Turning your head should turn you in-game!
